value.title: Make a Table Visualization to Display All Observations from Data Source in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this session, I’m demonstrating how we can show all the records even if it is the same as the Power BI table. We all know that the Power BI table visual automatically removes the duplicate rows from end-users in the table. But sometimes we need to show the end-users all the values from the data source

value.title: Power BI Admins Gain My Workspace Access
value.excerpt: During this video, we will check how Power BI Admins can get User's My Workspace Access. Power BI provides secure storage for user data in their "My Workspaces". By default, these workspaces are private and can only be shared with others if the owner has a Pro or Premium Per User license. However, in

value.title: Power BI: Dynamic Format String for Measures
value.excerpt: Recently Microsoft launched new Power BI feature - "Dynamic Format String for Measures". With dynamic format strings for measures, you can determine how measures appear in visuals by conditionally applying a format string with a separate DAX expression.  Dynamic format strings overcome an inherent disadvantage

value.title: Power BI Tip - Stop Visual Interactions at Report Level in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this vlog we will learn about how we can stop the interaction between the visualization. value.title: 3 steps to pin Reporting Services visuals to a Power BI Dashboard

value.title: 4 Troubleshooting connectivity tips with the gateway
value.excerpt: This video was based on a call I had last week relating to troubleshooting connectivity to a SQL Server named instance from the Power BI gateway.
